effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
